titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to repeal the requirement for voting assistance officers for members of the Armed Forces.
A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to repeal the requirement for voting assistance officers for members of the Armed Forces.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This bill repeals the requirement that the Department of Defense appoint or assign voting assistance officers as part of its voting assistance programs for members of the Armed Forces.
